publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-150 Brian Adam: Dental School for Aberdeen—That the Parliament applauds the Scottish Government’s decision to open a new dental school in Aberdeen next year and congratulates the new Minister for Public Health on taking prompt action to try to resolve the dental crisis that exists in the Grampian area.
S3M-150 Dental School for Aberdeen (lodged on 11 June 2007) Michael Matheson*
S3M-150 Dental School for Aberdeen (lodged on 11 June 2007) Alasdair Allan*, Nigel Don*

S3M-150 Brian Adam: Dental School for Aberdeen—That the Parliament applauds the Scottish Government’s decision to open a new dental school in Aberdeen next year and congratulates the new Minister for Public Health on taking prompt action to try to resolve the dental crisis that exists in the Grampian area. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Alasdair Allan, Nigel Don
S3M-150 Dental School for Aberdeen (lodged on 11 June 2007) Kenneth Gibson*
